org.jppf.utils

Class ExceptionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.utils.ExceptionUtils

  • public final class ExceptionUtils
extends Object
    This class provides a set of utility methods for manipulating Throwable objects.

      • getStackTrace

        public static String getStackTrace(Throwable t)
        Get a throwable's stack trace.
        Parameters:
        t - the throwable to get the stack trace from.
        Returns:
        the stack trace as a string.

      • getCallStack

        public static String getCallStack()
        Get the call stack for the current thread.
        Returns:
        the call stack as a string.

      • getMessage

        public static String getMessage(Throwable t)
        Get the message of the specified Throwable along with its class name.
        Parameters:
        t - the Throwable object from which to get the message.
        Returns:
        a formatted message from the Throwable.

      • toException

        public static Exception toException(Throwable throwable)
        Converts a generic Throwable into an Exception. If throwable is already an instance of Exception, it is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the Throwable to convert.
        Returns:
        an (possibly new) Exception wrapping the Throwable as its cause.
        Since:
        4.0

      • toException

        public static Exception toException(String message,
                    Throwable throwable)
        Converts a generic Throwable into an Exception.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the Throwable to convert.
        message - the message of the created exception.
        Returns:
        a new Exception wrapping the Throwable as its cause.
        Since:
        4.0

      • toRuntimeException

        public static RuntimeException toRuntimeException(Throwable throwable)
        Converts a generic Throwable into a RuntimeException. If throwable is already an instance of RuntimeException, it is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the Throwable to convert.
        Returns:
        a (possibly new) RuntimeException wrapping the Throwable as its cause.
        Since:
        4.0

      • toRuntimeException

        public static RuntimeException toRuntimeException(String message,
                                  Throwable throwable)
        Converts a generic Throwable into a RuntimeException.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the Throwable to convert.
        message - the message of the xcreated exception.
        Returns:
        a new RuntimeException wrapping the Throwable as its cause.
        Since:
        4.0

      • toException

        public static <E extends Exception> E toException(Throwable throwable,
                                  Class<E> clazz)
        Converts a generic Throwable into an Exception of the specified class. If throwable is already an instance of the specified exception class, it is returned as is.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of exception to return.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the Throwable to convert.
        clazz - the class of the exception to convert to.
        Returns:
        a (possibly new) exception of the specified class wrapping the Throwable as its cause, or null if an exception of this class cannot be constructed.
        Since:
        4.0

      • toException

        public static <E extends Exception> E toException(String message,
                                  Throwable throwable,
                                  Class<E> clazz)
        Converts a generic Throwable into an Exception of the specified class.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of exception to return.
        Parameters:
        message - the message of the xcreated exception.
        throwable - the Throwable to convert.
        clazz - the class of the exception to convert to.
        Returns:
        a new exception of the specified class wrapping the Throwable as its cause, or null if an exception of this class cannot be constructed.
        Since:
        4.0
